scripts.dev: npm run --prefix shared build && npm run all -- --kill-others "npm:on-frontend dev" "npm:on-backend dev"
scripts.dev:full: npm run all "docker-compose up" "npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run --prefix shared build && npm run all "npm:on-* build"
scripts.clean: npm run all "npm --prefix backend run clean" "npm --prefix frontend run clean" "npm --prefix shared run clean"  "npm --prefix serverless clean" && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.postinstall: npm run all "npm --prefix backend install" "npm --prefix frontend install" "npm --prefix shared install" "npm --prefix serverless install"
